name: Colorize
shortDescription: A relaxing color-filling app where users fill colors into pre-designed pictures from various themed galleries like Animals and Florals.
fullDescription:
Colorize is a soothing digital coloring app that lets users fill vibrant colors into beautifully designed line-art images. It focuses on providing a calm and enjoyable coloring experience — not sketching or drawing from scratch.

Key Features:

  • Curated Art Gallery: Choose from a wide selection of ready-made pictures categorized into themes such as 'Animals', 'Florals', and more.
  • Simple Fill Coloring: Tap to fill sections with your favorite colors using an intuitive color palette.
  • Clean Interface: Navigate easily through sections like 'Gallery', 'Inspiration', and 'My Designs' to view and manage your artwork.
  • Handy Tools: Includes essential options such as 'Undo' and 'Share' to refine and showcase your finished art.
  • Relax & Enjoy: Designed for relaxation and creativity without the complexity of drawing or sketching tools.

Colorize is perfect for anyone who enjoys mindful coloring — just pick an image, choose your palette, and bring artwork to life with color.
